Class TPirhana

java.lang.Object
  Thing
      TEnemy
          TPirhana

public class TPirhana
extends TEnemy

The little chomper dude that is found in pipes. They cannot be found anywhere else. If it does not have a parent pipe then it kills itelf.

Author:
Reed Weichler
